hero.title: Remember Every Place You've Been
hero.description: WhereWasI automatically tracks and organizes everywhere you go. Revisit your favorite spots, discover patterns in your daily life, and keep a private journal of your journey—all without lifting a finger.

features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to remember and explore your location history

list.title: Your Life in Timeline
list.description: Scroll through a beautifully organized history of everywhere you've been. See your visits by day, week, or month—your life story unfolds automatically.

list.title: Discover Your Patterns
list.description: Uncover insights about your daily life. See your most visited places, time spent at each location, and how your routines evolve over time.

list.title: Your World at a Glance
list.description: View all your visits plotted on an interactive map. Zoom out to see everywhere life has taken you, or zoom in to explore a single neighborhood.

list.title: Your Data, Your Device
list.description: All location data stays securely on your iPhone and your personal iCloud. Nothing is ever sent to external servers. Your journey remains yours alone.

download.title: Start Remembering Today
download.description: Free to download. Your location journal begins the moment you install. No account required—just you, your iPhone, and the places you go.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to know about WhereWasI

list.question: How does WhereWasI track my location?
list.answer: WhereWasI uses iOS location services to detect when you arrive and leave places. It runs efficiently in the background without draining your battery.

list.question: Is my location data private?
list.answer: Absolutely. All data is stored locally on your device and synced only to your personal iCloud account. We never see or store your location data on any external servers.

list.question: Can I edit or delete visits?
list.answer: Yes! You have full control. Edit visit times, merge duplicate places, add notes, or delete any visits you don't want to keep.

list.question: Does it drain my battery?
list.answer: No. WhereWasI uses Apple's power-efficient significant location change APIs, designed to minimize battery impact while still capturing your visits accurately.

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.description: WhereWasI keeps all your location data on your device and your personal iCloud account. Your travels are never shared with us or any third parties.
